title: Executive Order 5798-Power-Site Restoration No. 467, Oregon
content: So much of Executive order of December 12, 1917, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 660, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 2 S., R. 5 E., sec. 7, lot 5;
sec. 15, N. ½ NW. ¼, SW. ¼ NW. ¼.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5798-Power-Site Restoration No. 467, Oregon Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361351
